Title: Riot FOMO
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Jenji Kohan, Molly Smith Metzler (executive story editor), Rebecca Angelo (staff writer), Lauren Schuker Blum (staff writer), Josh Koenigsberg (staff writer), Anthony Natoli (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: As the standoff at the prison spirals into a full-blown riot, enterprising inmates take advantage of the confusion. Taystee confronts Caputo.
